description: The Photive NB-10L Rechargeable Lithium-ion Battery Pack has a capacity of 1200mAh, making it possible to shoot many photographs with your Canon PowerShot SX40, PowerShot G1X digital camera on a single battery charge. The battery is also compact and lightweight. There is no memory effect, so you can recharge partially drained batteries without reducing performance. The NB-10L battery also communicates with the Canon PowerShot cameras, so that you can always check the remaining capacity, shutter count and recharge performance on the cameras power source info screen. This battery features Lithium Ion technology, which ensures maximum battery life and maximum power. Also, Li-Ion batteries are lightweight and can be charged or discharged at any time without developing so called “memory effect”, so they never lose their ability to hold a full charge.Features:♦ Lithuim-Ion Technology♦ Japan Cells♦ Lightweight♦ No memory effect♦ 1200mAh♦ Output Voltage 7.4vCompatible:PowerShot SX-40 HSPowerShot G1XPowershot G15Powershot G16Poershot SX50 HS Photive is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high quality photographic accessories. Designed for consumers and professional photographers, our functional, durable and easy-to-use products will ensure you can take the best photos possible. Photive was founded by a team of dedicated leaders with over 80 years of success in the Photo accessory industry. Each item includes a Full Worldwide warranty and is 100% sanctioned for safe use
title: Photive Original NB-10L Ultra High Capacity Li-ion Battery For Canon G1X, Powershot G15, Powershot G16, PowerShot SX40 HS, Powershot SX50 HS (Canon NB-10L Replacement)
